ClassDesc: An Event object that provides information about the source of a connection-related event. ConnectionEvent objects are generated when an application closes a pooled connection and when an error occurs. The ConnectionEvent object contains two kinds of information: The pooled connection closed by the application In the case of an error event, the SQLException about to be thrown to the application
